ComicInfo.Title: Trial...and Verdict!; Hukka vs. the Bob!
ComicInfo.Writer: Keith Giffen,Mike Baron,Robert Loren Fleming,Mike Baron,Keith Giffen,Robert Loren Fleming,Karl Kesel,Tom Ziuko,Bob Lappan,Andy Helfer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Eduardo Barreto,Keith Giffen,Robert Loren Fleming,Eduardo Barreto,Keith Giffen
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trial...and Verdict!: Martin Champion and the crew are on trial for various crimes against New Earth. But his entire defense revolves around proving the existence of the Dark Destroyer.
Hukka vs. the Bob!: Chris buys the Hukka a new personal robot pal named BOB. But when BOB's antenna breaks, the robot goes on a rampage.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
